promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive basic gecko fighting-type wearing a stone crown. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crowneck, a massive basic gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Rocket Tackle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word gecko or fighting or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Crowneck lumbers through ruins, preying on the weak. Its formidable rocket tackle can demolish foes in a single blow.
